title: Justin Bieber reveals the 'wifey' necklace he made wife Hailey Bieber...two weeks after wedding
text:
Justin and Hailey Bieber have been showing off their loved up newlywed status since marrying for the second time late last month.

And the 25-year-old popstar showed off a handmade necklace he crafted for his bride, 22.

The Sorry singer shared a photo of his model wife to Instagram on Sunday, showing her in the new jewelry.

Wifey material: Justin Bieber shared a photo of his wife Hailey Bieber to Instagram on Sunday, showing her in the new necklace he made for her

In the snap, the blonde beauty looks off to her right side as she wears a black leather top with a matching crossbody bag hanging from her shoulder.

At the base of her neck was the black and yellow necklace that spelled out 'wifey' in silver letters.

She also donned chunky gold hoop earrings and a small diamond hoop.

Justin simply captioned it 'I made her a necklace.'

Second timers: The couple married in 2018 in a courthouse ceremony but wed for a second time on September 30 in a lavish ceremony with family and friend

Hailey's hair was up in a sleek ponytail for the photo.

The couple married in 2018 in a courthouse ceremony but wed for a second time on September 30 in a lavish ceremony with family and friends.

Photos of their nuptials have slowly been released over the last two weeks with new photos emerging from the beauty's stylist on Friday.

Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor.

Here comes the bride! New photos of Hailey from her wedding to Justin Bieber emerged from the beauty's stylist on Friday

The outfit featured thick straps, one of which had fallen down around her arm in the commotion, and the low-cut top highlighted the catwalk star's cleavage.

'The happiest bride I ever did see. Thank you @verawang for @haileybieber custom dress she danced the night away in it. And yes duh - sneakers,' captioned Maeve Reilly.

Justin and Hailey's religious ceremony took place September 30 at the Palmetto Bluff Hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina.

Dancing queen: Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor

Though there were plenty of celebrity guests, the actual ceremony took place in a chapel that only seated 100 guests.

Among the guests were Hailey's BFF Kendall Jenner and her younger sister Kylie and mom Kris Jenner as well as Fay Khadra and Jaden Smith.

R&B singer Usher was also present at the festivities, as was Hailey's cousin Ireland Baldwin, Leonardo DiCaprio's girlfriend Camila Morrone and Justin's manager Scooter Braun.

The dress Hailey walked down the aisle was designed by Off-White's Virgil Abloh.

She paired the lacy off–the–shoulder gown with a sheer veil over her delicately coiffed blonde tresses.

'@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress,' she captioned a snap of the outfit.

'You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation ❤️.'

A timeline of newlyweds Justin and Hailey Bieber's romance By CHRISTINE RENDON FOR DAILYMAIL.COM Justin Bieber and his wife Hailey have exchanged vows once again at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs in South Carolina, over a year after tying the knot at a New York courthouse in secret. But getting to happily ever after definitely didn't happen overnight. As the couple celebrate making it down the aisle a second time, it's time to take a look back at Justin and Hailey's relationship, from their first meeting as preteens to their rekindled romance nearly 10 years later. Hopelessly devoted to you: Justin Bieber and his wife Hailey have exchanged vows once again at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs in South Carolina, over a year after tying the knot at a New York courthouse in secret 2009: Justin and Hailey first meet Video of the couple being introduced to one another by Hailey's father Stephen Baldwin resurfaced in recent years. Recorded in 2009, the video captures a shy and young Hailey shaking hands with the pop sensation. Future Mr. and Mrs. Bieber: A young Hailey Baldwin is introduced to Justin Bieber by her father, Stephen Baldwin, in 2009 2015-2016: Going public The pair were in similar social circles, but it wasn't until 2015 that it was clear they were more than friends. The famous duo rang in 2016 together with a vacation to Anguilla, where Justin posted a photo of them sharing a kiss. At around this time, the couple acknowledged they were seeing each other, non-exclusively. Sealed with a kiss: The famous duo rang in 2016 together with a tropical vacation, where Justin posted a photo of them sharing a kiss 'We are not an exclusive couple,' Hailey told E! at the time. Justin also admitted Hailey was someone he 'really' loved, but wasn't ready to devote himself to a relationship. 'What if Hailey ends up being the girl I'm gonna marry, right? If I rush into anything, if I damage her, then it's always gonna be damaged,' he told GQ. Alas, the timing wasn't right for the pair. Justin ended up moving on briefly with Sofia Richie. New flame: The pop star moved on from Hailey with Lionel Richie's daughter, Sofia Richie, in 2016 2017: Justin reunites with his first love The Baby hit-maker rekindles his relationship with his on-off girlfriend, Selena Gomez. In an interview with Billboard, Selena admitted she never stopped caring for Justin. 'I'm 25. I'm not 18, or 19, or 20. I cherish people who have really impacted my life,' she said. 'So maybe before, it could have been forcing something that wasn't right. 'But that doesn't mean caring for someone ever goes away.' This ends up being short-lived as well. Together again: Bieber and Selena enjoyed a brief rekindling of their relationship in 2017 2018: Hailey and Justin get back together Right when it seemed they were really done, Justin and Hailey get back together. And the couple were not shy about it either. The lovebirds were often pictured packing on the PDA for all to see throughout New York City. Bling bling: Baldwin showed off her massive engagement ring while cuddling Justin July 2018: They're engaged! Just over a month after reigniting their romance, the couple were engaged. Justin proposed to Hailey during a romantic getaway to the Bahamas with a massive diamond ring. September 2018: Husband and wife Justin marries Hailey at a courthouse in New York City. September 2019: The couple tie the knot again in front of friends and family at the luxury Montage Palmetto Bluffs resort in South Carolina on September 30, 2019. So in love: After a roller coaster start to their relationship, Justin is now officially married to Hailey

----
description: Justin Bieber showed off a handmade necklace he crafted for his bride, Hailey Bieber.  The Sorry singer shared a photo of his model wife to Instagram on Sunday, showing her in the new jewelry.
